courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: LIS 504 or consent of instructor.
description: Aims to acquaint students with government publications, their variety, interest, value, acquisition, and bibliographic control, and to develop proficiency in their reference and research use; considers publications of all types and all governments (local, national, international) with special emphasis on U. S., state and federal governments, and on the United Nations and its related specialized agencies. Prerequisite: LIS 504 or consent of instructor.
label: Government Information
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Information Sciences department.
